content.question: The graph of a piecewise-linear function f, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FE8@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, is shown above. What is the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mn>4</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4387@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?
